text: Old Fashioned Love may refer to: *Old Fashioned Love (John Fahey album) *"Old Fashioned Love", standard song by James P. Johnson and Cecil Mack recorded by many artists 1923 *"Old Fashioned Love", 1939 song by Frank Loesser and Fritz Miller *Old Fashioned Love (Smokey Robinson song) (Gary Goetzman, Mike Piccirillo) single from Yes It's You Lady 1982
title: Old Fashioned Love
